I.name: Colossal Smash
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Periodically, '''Galio's''' next [[basic attack]] has an {{tip|uncancellable windup}} and is modified to deal {{pp|15 to 200|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ 100% AD)}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}} {{as|(+ 60% '''bonus''' magic resistance)}} {{as|magic damage}} to the target and all enemies near them.
''Colossal Smash'' can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}}, dealing {{as|{{critical damage|75|100}} AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} to all targets hit.
I.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Periodically, Galio's next basic attack has an uncancellable windup and is modified to deal 15 − 200 (based on level) (+ 100% AD) (+ 50% AP) (+ 60% bonus magic resistance) magic damage to the target and all enemies near them.
Colossal Smash can critically strike, dealing (+ IE 25%) AD bonus magic damage to all targets hit.
I.notes:
* {{tip|Spellblade}} does not get converted to magic damage and it will deal its damage only to the primary target.
* The empowered attack will not trigger against [[ward]]s.

Q.name: Winds of War
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Galio''' creates two windblasts 250 units to either side of him that arc out before converging to the target area, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies they pass through.

When the blasts meet, the gusts form a tornado that persists for 2 seconds and slowly moves forward, dealing {{as|magic damage}} every {{fd|0.5}} seconds to enemies within the area. The damage based on the target's health ratio is capped at 150 against {{tip|monsters}}.
''Winds of War will cast at max range if cast beyond that.''
Q.descriptionHtml:
Active: Galio creates two windblasts 250 units to either side of him that arc out before converging to the target area, dealing magic damage to all enemies they pass through.
When the blasts meet, the gusts form a tornado that persists for 2 seconds and slowly moves forward, dealing magic damage every 0.5 seconds to enemies within the area. The damage based on the target's health ratio is capped at 150 against monsters.
Winds of War will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
leveling: {{st|Tornado Magic Damage Per Tick|{{as|2% {{as|(+ {{fd|0.66%}} per 100 AP)}} of target's '''maximum''' health}}|Total Tornado Magic Damage|{{as|8% {{as|(+ {{fd|2.64}}% per 100 AP)}} of target's '''maximum''' health}}}}
Q.notes:
* Deals {{tip|area damage}} on the gust and applies {{tip|persistent area damage}} for the tornado. 
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the gusts damage but not the tornado's.
* {{cai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} and {{cai|Unbreakable|Braum}} can block each windblast individually.
** The tornado will not form if only one windblast reaches the target location.
{{Effect at cast time end}}

effects.str: • Gust Magic Damage: (+ 75% AP)

• Tornado Magic Damage Per Tick: 2% (+ 0.66% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health
  • Total Tornado Magic Damage: 8% (+ 2.64% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health

st_slices: 2% (+ 0.66% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health
8% (+ 2.64% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health

W1.name: Shield of Durand
description:
{{sbc|Passive:}} '''Galio''' gains ''Anti-Magic Bulwark'', and restores it after 12 seconds without taking damage.

{{sbc|Anti-Magic Bulwark:}} Gain a {{tip|shield}} that absorbs {{as|magic damage}}.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Galio''' {{tip|channel|charges}} for up to 3 seconds, {{tip|slow|slowing}} himself by 15%, and gaining {{as|magic damage}} {{tip|Damage reduction|reduction}} and half of that amount as {{as|physical damage}} reduction; charging increases ''Shield of Durand's'' radius, damage and {{tip|taunt}} duration over the first 2 seconds of the channel.
''Shield of Durand'' can be recast during this time, and does so automatically after the duration or when {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}}.

{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Galio''' refreshes the [[damage modifier|damage reduction]] for 2 seconds and {{tip|taunt|taunts}} nearby enemy champions, setting their {{sti|ms|{{as|movement speed}}}} to a {{as|static 60|ms}} for {{pp|type=channel time|0.5 to 1.5 for 9|0 to 2|formula=0.5+(0.125 per 0.25 seconds channeled).}} seconds. This also deals {{as|magic damage}}, increased by {{pp|type=channel time|key=%|0 to 200 for 9|0 to 2|formula=100%+(25% per 0.25 seconds channeled).}}.
W1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Galio gains Anti-Magic Bulwark, and restores it after 12 seconds without taking damage.

Anti-Magic Bulwark: Gain a shield that absorbs magic damage.
Active: Galio charges for up to 3 seconds, slowing himself by 15%, and gaining magic damage reduction and half of that amount as physical damage reduction; charging increases Shield of Durand's radius, damage and taunt duration over the first 2 seconds of the channel.
Shield of Durand can be recast during this time, and does so automatically after the duration or when interrupted.
Recast: Galio refreshes the damage modifier for 2 seconds and taunts nearby enemy champions, setting their movement speed to a static 60 for 0 to 2 ‒ undefined seconds. This also deals magic damage, increased by 0 to 2 ‒ undefined.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage Reduction|{{ap|20 to 40}}% {{as|(+ 5% per 100 AP)}} {{as|(+ 8% per 100 '''bonus''' magic resistance)}}|Physical Damage Reduction|{{ap|10 to 20}}% {{as|(+ {{fd|2.5}}% per 100 AP)}} {{as|(+ 4% per 100 '''bonus''' magic resistance)}}}}
{{st|Minimum Magic Damage|{{ap|20 to 80}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}}|Maximum Magic Damage|{{ap|20*3 to 80*3}} {{as|(+ 90% AP)}}}}
W1.notes:
* '''Galio''' is {{tip|lockout|locked out}} of attacking and casting for {{fd|0.4}} seconds after recasting.
** '''Galio''' may still buffer his actions during this time.
* ''Static movement speed'' cannot be modified by {{sti|movement speed|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} or {{tip|slow resist}}.
** This effect is negated only if the target is {{tip|slow-immune}}.
* The ability key does not need to be held down when buffered in other abilities except from {{ai|Winds of War|Galio}}.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Galio''' is {{tip|channel|channeling}}:
{{ct|charge|attack=false|cast=false|move=true|items=interrupts,true,,false|consume=true|spells=true,false,false,interrupts,recasts|interrupts=death, silence}}

effects.str: • Magic Damage Shield: % of maximum health

• Magic Damage Reduction: % (+ 5% per 100 AP) (+ 8% per 100 bonus magic resistance)
  • Physical Damage Reduction: % (+ 2.5% per 100 AP) (+ 4% per 100 bonus magic resistance)

st_slices: % (+ 5% per 100 AP) (+ 8% per 100 bonus magic resistance)
% (+ 2.5% per 100 AP) (+ 4% per 100 bonus magic resistance)

effects.str:
• Minimum Magic Damage: (+ 30% AP)
  • Maximum Magic Damage: (+ 90% AP)

E.name: Justice Punch
description: {{sbc|Active:}} During the cast time, '''Galio''' {{tip|lunge|steps}} backwards in the opposite direction. He then {{tip|dash|dashes}} to the target location until he hits an enemy {{tip|champion}} or [[terrain]].

'''Galio''' deals {{as|magic damage}} to enemies he passes through, reduced by 50% against non-champions, and {{tip|airborne|knocks them up}} for {{fd|0.75}} seconds as well as {{tip|standard sight|reveals}} them for the same duration.
''Justice Punch will cast at max range if cast beyond that.''
E.descriptionHtml:
Active: During the cast time, Galio steps backwards in the opposite direction. He then dashes to the target location until he hits an enemy champion or terrain.
Galio deals magic damage to enemies he passes through, reduced by 50% against non-champions, and knocks them up for 0.75 seconds as well as reveals them for the same duration.
Justice Punch will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
leveling: {{st|Champion Magic Damage|{{ap|90 to 250}} {{as|(+ 90% AP)}}|Non-Champion Magic Damage|{{ap|90/2 to 250/2}} {{as|(+ 45% AP)}}}}

effects.str:
• Champion Magic Damage: (+ 90% AP)
  • Non-Champion Magic Damage: (+ 45% AP)

R.name: Hero's Entrance
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Galio''' designates the target allied {{tip|champion|champion's}} location at the time of cast as his landing spot, resetting ''{{ais|Shield of Durand 2|Galio|Shield of Durand}}'' passive magic {{tip|shield}} for himself and additionally granting it to all allied champions in the area he casted it at for 5 seconds, and {{tip|channels}} for {{fd|2.75}} seconds.

After channeling for {{fd|1.25}} seconds, '''Galio''' gains {{tip|cc-immune|crowd control immunity}} for the remaining duration and becomes {{tip|untargetable}}, then leaps into the air for {{tt|{{fd|0.85 seconds}}|Estimated}} before {{tip|dash|dashing}} to the location over {{tt|{{fd|0.25 seconds}}|Estimated}}, after which he lands and becomes targetable again, standing in place for {{tt|{{fd|0.4 seconds}}|Estimated}} and dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all nearby enemies on impact as well as {{tip|airborne|knocking them back}} 100 units over {{fd|0.75}} seconds.
R.descriptionHtml:
Active: Galio designates the target allied champion's location at the time of cast as his landing spot, resetting Galio's Shield of Durand 2 passive magic shield for himself and additionally granting it to all allied champions in the area he casted it at for 5 seconds, and channels for 2.75 seconds.
After channeling for 1.25 seconds, Galio gains crowd control immunity for the remaining duration and becomes untargetable, then leaps into the air for 0.85 seconds before dashing to the location over 0.25 seconds, after which he lands and becomes targetable again, standing in place for 0.4 seconds and dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies on impact as well as knocking them back 100 units over 0.75 seconds.
R.notes:
* ''Hero's Entrance'' does not resist allied {{tip|crowd control}}.
* '''Galio''' cannot cast ''Hero's Entrance'' on allies he cannot {{tip|sight|see}} while {{tip|Nearsight|nearsighted}}.
* '''Galio''' will still cause an impact to occur at the destination even if he is unable to travel the full distance with the dash (e.g. by {{ais|The Hextech Ultimatum|Camille}} and {{ais|Realm of Death|Mordekaiser}} borders and terrain). '''Galio''' will dash as far as he can go, and thus, does not end the dash prematurely.
* '''Galio''' will always dash 100 units minimum, and dash ''over'' his target's location if they are less than 100 units away from him.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Galio''' is {{tip|channel|channeling}}:
{{ct|channel|attack=false|cast=false|move=false|items=false, true|spells=true, false, false, false, false|interrupts=death, root, silence, ground}}
* ''Hero's Entrance's'' channel can only be {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}} by {{tip|crowd control}} in the first {{fd|1.25}} seconds.
